name: Planet Unknown Runner
description: You are a brave explorer and discoverer of new planets. Behind your shoulders you have many discoveries and adventures. And now you are on another uncharted planet. It is not as friendly as it would like to be. Will you cope with your mission and get out of here alive?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I7 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960 Storage: 150 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core I7 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 960 Storage: 150 MB available space
